address_book.confirm_message: Confirming this operation will reset your address book data. To avoid losing your data entirely, you can copy the data to the clipboard and save it.
address_book.data_anomaly_description: Your contact data may have undergone abnormal changes. To ensure the security of your assets, we strongly recommend resetting your address book.
address_book.data_anomaly_why_reset: Why do I need to reset my address book?
address_book.data_anomaly_why_reset_desc: Resetting the data will result in the loss of your current contact information. However, it will fully ensure the security of your assets.
address_book.data_anomaly_why_risk: Why is my data at risk?
address_book.data_anomaly_why_risk_descr: Your data is different from the last confirmation save. OneKey doesn't save your data, but ensures Ensure that the data will not be tampered with.
address_book.empty_description: You haven't added any address yet.
address_book.encrypted_storage_descripti: OneKey ensures your information security. All your contact data is encrypted and hash-verified with each use to prevent tampering.
address_book.no_results_description: No match found for your search. Please re-enter.

backup.data_already_present: 此備份中的所有數據，在當前設備上都已存在。
backup.enable_feature_download_google_dr: 要啓用此功能，請下載 Google Drive 後登錄，並確保已授權給 OneKey 必要的權限。
backup.file_permanently_deleted: 此文件將從 iCloud 中永久刪除，請確保您已記下助記詞，否則將無法恢復錢包
backup.google_drive_auto_backup_paused: Google Drive 自動備份已暫停
backup.google_drive_securely_syncs_data: Google Drive 可以安全地同步您各個設備上的數據（不包括硬件錢包），請授權 OneKey 訪問。請放心，OneKey 和 Google 都無法訪問您的錢包。
backup.icloud_backup_securely_syncs_your: iCloud 備份會安全地將您的數據（硬件錢包除外）同步到各種設備，且 OneKey 和 Apple 都無法訪問您的錢包
backup.no_available_google_drive_backups: 暫無可供導入的 Google Drive 備份
backup.no_available_icloud_backups_to_im: 您沒有可供導入的 iCloud 備份
backup.onekey_doesnt_back_up_hardware_wa: OneKey 不會備份硬體錢包，請記錄並妥善保管您的助記詞。
backup.only_accounts_with_addresses_will: 對於 App 錢包，只會備份有地址的帳戶。
backup.please_log_in_to_your_apple_accou: 請登錄您的 Apple 賬戶，並打開 iCloud Drive 功能再繼續
backup.please_upgrade_app_to_import_data: 請升級您的應用程式以從較新版本匯入資料
backup.securely_store_recent_backups: 我們將安全地存儲您最近 30 天的每日自動備份以及過去 24 個月的每月最後一個自動備份，您可以隨時從這些備份中恢復。
backup.verify_app_password_to_import_dat: 驗證在備份時使用的應用密碼以導入數據
backup.verify_apple_account_and_icloud_d: 請驗證您的 Apple 賬戶登錄，並確保已在 iCloud Drive 中授權給 OneKey 必要的權限
backup.verify_google_account_and_google_: 請驗證您的 Google 賬戶登錄，並確保已在 Google Drive 中授權給 OneKey 必要的權限
balance_detail.disable_protection_warnin: Disabling inscription protection may result in the accidental transfer of inscription tokens or NFTs. To migrate your inscription assets safely, please use an inscription-compatible wallet such as Unisat or OKX.

balance_detail.enable_protection_warning:
Inscription assets (Ordinals NFT and BRC-20 tokens) are currently not supported. To view the details of the protection, check "Balance Details".

dapp_connect.detected_malicious_behavior: Detected malicious behavior on this site by multiple credible sources, it is strongly recommended to reject any request by this site.
dapp_connect.hardware_wallets_do_not_sup: Hardware wallets do not support Solana message signing.
dapp_connect.msg_description_can_be_up_t: Description can be up to {number} characters.
dapp_connect.risk_sign: This type of signature request can sometimes be used for malicious purposes. Only sign it if you fully trust the website.
dapp_connect.site_not_using_private_conn: The site does not use a private connection, attackers may be able to view and change the information you send and get through this site.
dapp_connect.site_suspected_of_malicious: This site is suspected of malicious behavior, continuing to approve requests may pose security risks.
dapp_connect.suspected_malicious_behavio: Suspected malicious behavior on this site.
dapp_connect.the_sites_connection_is_not: The site's connection is not secure.
dapp_connect.url_contains_unusual_charac: URL contains unusual characters, suspected to be a malicious site.
dapp_connect.verified_web3_site_warning: Verified Web3 site by multiple credible sources, can be used with confidence.

device_auth.continue_anyway_warning_mess: We're currently unable to verify your device. Continuing may pose security risks.
device_auth.request_desc: Confirm on your device to verify its authenticity and secure your connection.
device_auth.successful_desc: Your device is now officially verified! You're all set to enjoy a secure and seamless experience.
device_auth.temporarily_unavailable_help: Currently, we're unable to verify your device due to server issues. Please try again later.
device_auth.unofficial_device_detected_h: Your device could not be verified as official. Please contact us immediately.
earn.claim_limitations: Due to the limitations of Lido, you must claim each of your redemptions separately.
earn.claim_token_desc: Claim your {token} after the withdrawal request has been processed.
earn.earn_up_to_number_per_year_desc: The APR is updated hourly and adjusted according to changes in TVL.
earn.how_does_the_lido_protocol_work: How does the Lido protocol work?
earn.how_does_the_lido_protocol_work_des: Lido provides an innovative solution to the hurdles presented by traditional PoS staking by effectively lowering barriers to entry and the costs associated with locking up one's assets in a single protocol. When a user deposits their assets to Lido, the tokens are staked on the Lido blockchain via the protocol.
earn.receive_lido_nft_desc: Each withdrawal request generates a Lido NFT, and its appearance changes when your {token} becomes available for withdrawal.
earn.receive_steth_desc: When you stake ETH you receive 1:1 stETH. You can unstake and trade this liquid asset at any time.
earn.receive_stmatic_desc: When you stake MATIC you receive stMATIC. You can unstake and trade this liquid asset at any time.
earn.request_withdrawal_steth_desc: Lock your stETH/wstETH by issuing a withdrawal request. After 1-4 days, the locked stETH will be destroyed and your ETH will become available for withdrawal.
earn.request_withdrawal_stmatic_desc: 1-4 days after issuing a withdrawal request, the locked stMATIC will be destroyed and your MATIC will become available for withdrawal.
earn.rewards_updated_daily_steth_desc: There’ll be a daily update on your stETH balances, which includes the staking rewards.
earn.rewards_updated_daily_stmatic_desc: During the staking period, the value of stMATIC changes to reflect earnings.
earn.stake_release_period_desc: After issuing a withdrawal request, you'll get an NFT certificate to claim funds. It'll take about 1-4 days before you can claim.
earn.wallet_not_support_stake: The connected wallet do not support stake. Try switch to another one.
earn.what_is_the_possible_risk_of_lido: What is the possible risk of Lido?
earn.what_is_the_possible_risk_of_lido_d: There is a certain risk in using Lido for staking, such as network or validator failures that may result in the loss of staked assets (penalties), or Lido smart contract vulnerabilities or errors. Although the code has been open-sourced, audited and widely covered, any cryptocurrency investment carries risks and needs to be evaluated independently.
earn.why_do_you_receive_steth_desc: When you deposit ETH into Lido, you receive Lido's liquid staking token, stETH, which represents your proportional claim to ETH in Lido. As validators operating on Lido receive rewards, you are eligible to receive rewards proportional to your stake, which is typically expected to occur daily.
earn.why_do_you_receive_stmatic_desc: When you deposit MATIC into Lido, you receive Lido's liquid staking token, stMATIC, which represents your proportional claim to MATIC in Lido. As validators operating on Lido receive rewards, you are eligible to receive rewards proportional to your stake, which is typically expected to occur daily.
earn.withdrawal_process_desc: The withdrawal process is simple and will be divided into the following steps:
enter_pin.desc: Check device screen for keypad layout.
enter_pin.title: Enter PIN code

faq.private_key_desc: A unique alphanumeric code to control your assets.
faq.recovery_phrase_explaination: A series of 12, 18, or 24 words to restore your wallet.
faq.recovery_phrase_safe_store: Is it safe to enter it into OneKey?
faq.recovery_phrase_safe_store_desc: Yes, it’s stored locally and never leave your device without your explicit permission.
faq.watched_account_desc: Watched account in OneKey allows monitoring of a specific address but cannot send or receive funds. It's useful for tracking transactions or monitoring holdings.
feedback.address_mismatch_desc: The address doesn’t match the hardware wallet. Stop using this address immediately and contact us.
form.keep_hidden_wallet_label_desc: Hidden wallets clear on app close. Toggle to preserve.

global.passphrase_desc: Passphrase adds a custom phrase to your recovery phrase to create a hidden wallet. Each hidden wallet has its passphrase. Do not forget it, as it can't be retrieved & funds will be lost permanently.
global.search_no_results_desc: Try to change the search keyword

onboarding.activate_device_by_restore_he: Restore your wallet using an existing recovery phrase.
onboarding.activate_device_by_restore_wa: Your package should not contain any pre-set PINs or Recovery Phrases. If such items are found, stop using the device and immediately contact OneKey Support for assistance.
onboarding.activate_device_by_set_up_new: Configure your device to create a new wallet.
onboarding.activate_device_choosing_lang: After choosing a language on your device and reviewing the basic guide:
onboarding.activate_device_help_text: Set up your hardware wallet to get started.
onboarding.backup_recovery_phrase_help_t: Write down each phrase in order and store them in a secure location
onboarding.bluetooth_permission_needed_h: To connect via Bluetooth, please enable access in Settings.
onboarding.bluetooth_prepare_to_connect_: Ensure the device is powered on and within range, then press "Start connection" below to start the connection
onboarding.bullet_forgot_password_use_re: If you forget your password, you can use the recovery phrase to get back into your wallet.
onboarding.bullet_never_share_recovery_p: Never share it with anyone or enter it into any form.
onboarding.bullet_onekey_support_no_reco: OneKey Support will never ask for your recovery phrase.
onboarding.bullet_recovery_phrase_full_a: The recovery phrase alone gives you full access to your wallets and funds.
onboarding.create_qr_wallet_desc: To display your QR code in device, navigate to "Connect App Wallet" > "QR Code" > "OneKey Wallet"
onboarding.create_qr_wallet_title: Create QR-based wallet with OneKey Pro
onboarding.device_set_up_backup_desc: Securely record your recovery phrase and complete the check. It's crucial for accessing your wallet if you forget your PIN or lose your device.
onboarding.device_set_up_create_new_wall: Initiate your wallet setup by selecting "Create New Wallet". You will be guided through creating a unique recovery phrase and setting a secure PIN.
onboarding.device_set_up_enter_recovery_: Carefully enter your recovery phrase word by word. This unique phrase is essential for the security and recovery of your wallet.
onboarding.device_set_up_import_desc: Follow the prompts to secure your wallet with a PIN and enter your recovery phrase to complete the process.
onboarding.device_set_up_pin_desc: Create a strong PIN to protect your wallet just like you would with a bank card. Avoid easy sequences or repeated numbers.
onboarding.enable_bluetooth_help_text: Bluetooth needs to be turned on to proceed.
onboarding.import_recovery_phrase_warnin: For your asset safety, avoid importing the recovery phrase of your hardware wallet and use "Connect Hardware Wallet" for optimal security.
onboarding.install_onekey_bridge_help_te: OneKey Bridge facilitates seamless communication between OneKey and your browser for a better experience.
onboarding.onekey_hw_intro_desc: OneKey Hardware Wallet, a secure and user-friendly solution for crypto management. It supports multiple cryptocurrencies and ensures robust encryption for safe transactions.
onboarding.save_phrase_securely_instruct: Read the following, then save the phrase securely.
provider.route_no_information: The provider does not currently have route information. Your funds are safe.

remove_device_desc: This will permanently delete your data. But you still can restore it from the hardware wallet which is loaded the recovery phrase of this wallet.
remove_hidden_wallet_desc: This will permanently delete your data. Ensure you have saved the passphrase of this hidden wallet.
remove_private_key_account_desc: You can restore the account using its private key after removal. Ensure it's backed up to avoid permanent loss of access.
remove_wallet_desc: Make sure you've written down the recovery phrase before removing the wallet. Otherwise, you won't be able to recover the wallet.
remove_wallet_double_confirm_message: I've written down the recovery phrase
reset_app_desc: This will delete all the data you have created on OneKey. After making sure that you have a proper backup, enter "RESET" to reset the App

在您的瀏覽器中打開此鏈接以清除緩存：
chrome://settings/clearBrowserData
settings.clear_browser_cache_desc2: Please go to the browser settings page to continue clearing.
settings.clear_pending_transactions_desc: Clear the pending data in the local history record.
settings.create_remove_wallets_desc: No password needed for creating/removing wallets
settings.export_state_logs_desc: This will help us debug any issue you might encounter. Please send to OneKey support or
settings.go_to_settings_page_now: Go to the Settings Page Now?
settings.hardware_wallets_not_appear: Hardware wallets will not appear here.
settings.how_to_import_from_onekey_keyta: How to import from OneKey KeyTag？

將每行的數字相加，這個總和代表了單詞在單詞列表中的位置。
然後，訪問 {dotmap} 網站，找到這個位置對應的單詞。
settings.import_recovery_phrase_from_one: Import recovery phrase from your OneKey KeyTag
Import recovery phrase from your OneKey Lite
settings.nfc_not_supported: Your current device does not support NFC, replace it with an NFC-enabled device and try again.
settings.no_connected_sites_desc: All sites connected through OneKey will appear here.
settings.no_signed_text_desc: All text signed through OneKey will appear here.
settings.no_signed_transactions_desc: All transactions signed through OneKey will appear here.
settings.onekey_keytag_desc: Powerful wallet backup kit made of titanium alloy
settings.onekey_lite_desc: Restore your wallet without typing one word.
settings.onekey_wants_to_use_nfc_desc: To connect to OneKey Lite, NFC permissions are required.
settings.reset_app_desc: This will delete all data on OneKey. Ensure you have a backup, then enter "RESET" to proceed.
settings.spend_dust_utxo_desc: Using dust UTXO increases transaction fees and reduces privacy. It's recommended to disable this feature to avoid malicious tracking.
settings.step1_get_bip39_dotmap_desc: 請訪問線上的{dotmap}，或參考您購買 KeyTag 附帶的入門指南。
settings.step2_match_recovery_phrase_dot: 在 {dotmap} 上找到您助記詞中的每個單詞對應的點陣圖。
settings.step3_align_and_punch_desc:
KeyTag 的每一行代表一個單詞。使用中心打孔工具根據黑色圓圈的位置進行精確打孔。
對於密碼短語備份，請在標有“*”的行上打孔。
settings.system_idle_lock_desc: When enabled, starts timing when there is no user activity, even if the app is in the foreground.
settings.token_risk_reminder_desc: When enabled, you'll be reminded when selecting non-verified tokens.
settings.turn_on_nfc: Turn on NFC and Let "OneKey" Connect Your Hardware Devices
slippage_tolerance.description: Auto slippage optimizes slippage based on pool liquidity and trading volume, reducing transaction failures and MEV attack risks.
slippage_tolerance.error_message: Slippage Tolerance must be between 0 to 50%.
slippage_tolerance.popover: Slippage tolerance is a setting for the amount of price slippage you are willing to accept for a trade.
slippage_tolerance.title: Slippage tolerance
slippage_tolerance.warning_message_1: High slippage tolerance may cause your asset loss.
slippage_tolerance.warning_message_2: Slippage under {number}% may cause trade failure.
swap_history.title: History
swap_history_detail.delete_title: Are you sure to delete all history?
swap_history_detail.title: Transaction
swap_page.alert.account_does_not_support: Connected account doesn't support {network} swap. Try another.
swap_page.alert.fee_exceeds_amount: Est Network fee exceeds swap amount, proceed with caution.
swap_page.alert.network_fee_deducted: Network fee in ETH deducted automatically in the next step.
swap_page.alert.not_best_rate: The current provider does not offer the best rate for this trade.
swap_page.alert.value_drop: {number} value drop! High price impact may cause your asset loss.
swap_page.button_no_enough_fee: Not enough to cover network fee
swap_page.provider.approve_usdt_dialog_c: Some tokens require multiple transactions to modify the allowance. You must first set the allowance to zero before establishing the new desired allowance value.
swap_page.provider.approve_usdt_dialog_t: Need to send 2 transactions to change allowance
swap_page.swap_steps_1_approve_dialog: The first time you swap or add liquidity, you have to approve the token to be swapped. This gives the Provider permission to swap that token from your wallet.
token_selector.empty_content: The token selected does not support cross-chain to this network.
token_selector.risk_reminder.checkbox: Don't show this alert for all non-verified tokens
token_selector.risk_reminder.message: Anyone can issue tokens, including counterfeit tokens under valid projects. User who bought counterfeit tokens might not be able to sell them, resulting in asset loss. If you proceed to trade this custom token, you’ll be liable to all potential risk and responsibilities.
token_selector.risk_reminder.title: Risk reminder
token_selector.title: Select Token
token_selector.unverified_token_warning: Unverified Token below. Proceed with caution.

update.connection_interrupted_desc: 連線已遺失，請檢查您的網路設定並重試。
update.connection_to_bridge_timed_out: Bridge 連接超時，請檢查您的網絡連接，然後再試一次。
update.device_connected_via_bluetooth: 我的裝置已透過藍牙連接
update.device_connected_via_bluetooth_em: 我的裝置已透過藍牙連接 📲
update.device_connected_via_usb: 我的裝置已透過 USB 連接線連接 🔌
update.device_connected_via_usb_emoji: 我的裝置已透過 USB 連接線連接 🔌
update.device_disconnected_desc: 設備已斷開連線，請重新連接裝置並重新啟動升級程序。
update.device_in_bootloader_mode: 設備處於 bootloader 模式
update.device_mismatch_detected_desc: 檢測到連接了另一臺設備，請連接原本用於此操作的設備。
update.download_timed_out_check_connecti: 下載超時，請檢查您的網路連線。
update.downloading_latest_ui_resources: 正在下載最新的 UI 資源...
update.ensure_one_usb_device_connected: 請確保只有一個 USB 設備正在連接狀態，如果連接了多個設備，請斷開其他設備並重試。
update.failed_to_enter_bootloader_mode: 無法進入 bootloader 模式
update.firmware_version_available: 韌體可更新至 {version} 版本
update.follow_online_tutorial_to_proceed: 請按照<url>線上教學</url>手動操作，然後按一下「重試」。
update.hardware_sdk_initialization_faile: 硬體 SDK 初始化失敗，請檢查您的網路或切換代理，然後再試一次。
update.hardware_update_requires_bridge: 硬體更新需要最新的 OneKey Bridge 軟體，請造訪我們的線上教學<url> [下載並更新OneKey Bridge] </url>以取得詳細的安裝說明。
update.hardware_wallet_in_bootloader_mod:
您的硬件錢包目前處於 bootloader 模式，這是用於軟件更新的模式，您現在想要更新嗎？
如果您不想更新，請手動重啓設備以返回正常模式。

您的硬體錢包目前處於啟動模式，用於軟體更新。
偵測到設備上現有的韌體。連接應用程式之前，請將裝置重新啟動至正常模式。
update.init_iframe_load_fail: 初始化 iframe 載入失敗
update.insufficient_battery_power_desc: 連接的硬體設備電池電量不足，無法繼續升級，請先為設備充電，然後再重試。
update.insufficient_disk_space_clear_ret: 磁碟空間不足，請清理後再試。
update.keep_bluetooth_connected_and_app_: 在升級過程中，請保持藍牙連接並保持應用程序處於亮屏狀態。
update.keep_usb_connected_and_app_active: 在升級過程中，請保持 USB 連接並保持應用程序處於亮屏狀態。
update.manually_entering_bootloader_mode: 手動進入 bootLoader 模式
要在 OneKey Mini 上進入 bootLoader 模式，請在將數據線插入電腦時按住鎖定螢幕按鈕，然後按一下「驗證狀態並繼續」。
update.network_exception_check_connectio: 網路異常，請檢查您的網路連線。
update.network_instability_check_connect: 網路不穩定，請檢查您的網路連線。
update.only_one_device_connected: 當前僅連接了一台裝置 📱
update.only_one_device_connected_emoji: 當前僅連接了一台裝置 📱
update.only_one_usb_device_supported_for: 每次僅支持連接一個 USB 設備進行升級
update.operation_canceled_desc: 操作已取消，請再試一次。
update.outdated_version_detected_desc: 您目前的韌體版本太低，請造訪我們的線上教學<url> 【Touch上韌體升級失敗的解決方案】 </url>並按照逐步說明完成更新。
update.ready_to_upgrade_checklist: 準備好升級了嗎？讓我們檢查一下您是否已準備就緒 📝
update.reboot_to_bootloader_mode: 重新啟動至 bootloader 模式
update.server_not_responding_try_later: 伺服器未回應，請稍後再試。
update.unable_to_connect_to_bridge: 無法連接到 Bridge，請檢查您的網路連接，然後重試。
update.update_app_available: App 可更新至 {version} 版本
update.update_in_official_web_tool: 請在官方網路工具更新
update.update_in_official_web_tool_desc:
您的硬體錢包韌體需要更新，
請在您的電腦上造訪<url> firmware.onekey.so </url>以繼續升級。
update.update_required_desc: 您的硬體錢包版本太舊，必須更新才能繼續。
update.updating_ui_resources: 正在更新 UI 資源...
